alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:03PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Benton, northern Madison, southern Carroll and northeastern Washington Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 403 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Osage to Springdale. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Berryville... Huntsville... Lowell... Green Forest... Tontitown... Cave Springs... Hindsville... Carrollton... Rudd... Forum... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Withrow Springs State Park... War Eagle... Marble... Osage... Rule... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 64 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
